special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
descriptions: The xvart's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. it can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect magic, mage armor (self only)

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The xvart is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC ll, +3 to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:
Cantrips (at will): eldritch blast, mage hand, minor illusion, poison spray, prestidigitation
1st-2nd level (2 2nd-level slots): burning hands, expeditious retreat, invisibility, scorching ray

special_abilities.name: Low Cunning.
descriptions: The xvart can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

special_abilities.name: Overbearing Pack.
descriptions: The xvart has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks to shove a creature if at least one of the xvart's allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally isn't incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Raxivort's Tongue.
descriptions: The xvart can communicate with ordinary bats and rats, as well as giant bats and giant rats.

actions.name: Scimitar.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) slashing damage.
